definitions: A fruit-flavoured dessert made by warming and then cooling a liquid containing gelatin or a similar setting agent in a mould or dish so that it sets into a semi-solid, somewhat elastic mass.
A clear gelatinous substance made with fruit or other ingredients and eaten with savoury foods as a condiment.
A type of clear gelatinous jam.
A savoury preparation with a gelatinous consistency made by boiling meat and bones.
Any substance of a gelatinous consistency.
A small sweet made with gelatin.
A tablet of the drug Temazepam.
